page.prototype: dim result as B = a5_convertImage(B bInput, C requiredFormat)

argument.name: bInput
argument.description: Input file as a binary object. Data can be .bmp, .jpg, .jpeg, or .png format.

description.p: Returns the converted image as a blob in the requested format. Returns an empty blob if the conversion could not be performed.

discussion.p: Converts a blob containing image data to another image format. Supported output image formats: .bmp, .jpg, and .png. To convert to other image formats, use [a5_runImageMagicCommand()].

link.link: api a5 runimage magic command function

ref.link: api a5 runimage magic command function
